name: Multisend
description: Batch send TON and jettons to up to 254 recipients in a single transaction

tools.name: multisend_info
tools.description: Multisend wallet address, balance, deployment status

tools.name: multisend_fund
tools.description: Fund the multisend wallet from agent wallet

tools.name: multisend_batch_ton
tools.description: Send TON to up to 254 recipients in one TX

tools.name: multisend_batch_jetton
tools.description: Send jettons to up to 254 recipients in one TX

tools.name: multisend_status
tools.description: On-chain wallet state and sequence info
